memberdef.name: LV_SLIDER_SIZE_MIN
memberdef.initializer: 4 /*hor. pad and ver. pad cannot make the bar or indicator smaller then this [px]*/

detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the sliders
slider
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a slider objects
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new slider
copy
pointer to a slider object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created slider

Set the 'knob in' attribute of a slider
slider
pointer to slider object
in
true: the knob is drawn always in the slider; false: the knob can be out on the edges

Set a style of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the value of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
the value of the slider

Give the slider is being dragged or not
slider
pointer to a slider object
true: drag in progress false: not dragged

Get the 'knob in' attribute of a slider
slider
pointer to slider object
true: the knob is drawn always in the slider; false: the knob can be out on the edges

Get a style of a slider
slider
pointer to a slider object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style
